attributes.action: Give all Disabled People and WCA a fair assessment by Atos, Capita and Maximus.
attributes.additional_details: and wasn't trained in my problems i am under 3 consultants and my gp at 2 different hospital on 13 lots of medication and im only 24 years old suffering my depression and also guillain barre syndrome and now i am homebound and need taxis everywhere and i think this need to change by giving a fair assessment and let doctors have more the say instead of nurses who aint trained in certain areas also all assessments should HAVE to be recorded and i don't see how a nurse con over rule my doctors
attributes.background: I Myself and many others have suffered from unfair assessments by Atos Healthcare is the worse one out of them and capita and maximus for ESA and PIP on my PIP claim i had a nurse lie and she said one thing in the assessment and another on the claim form also refused to look at all my evidence
